nodes.text: Vu Chusker was a male member of a blue-skinned species who was an associate of the crime lord Cabrool Nuum. In the year 5 BBY, shortly after Nuum's death, Chusker was killed by the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure on the planet Smarteel.

By the year 5 BBY, Vu Chusker was a known associate of Cabrool Nuum, a crime lord based on the planet Smarteel. By this time Nuum had come to consider Chusker a great threat to his own safety, and as such demanded that the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure kill his associate as a favor to him. Jabba, who had only heard of Chusker but not met him, refused and Nuum imprisoned him in the hopes he would change his mind. The Hutt escaped with the help of Nuum's son Rusk and killed his captor, following which he killed Rusk and then his sister Norba as well when they claimed power and also demanded that Chusker die. Shortly after the demise of the Nuum family, Chusker arrived on Smarteel to meet with Nuum and ran into Jabba. He questioned the Hutt as to why he was on Smarteel and once Jabba learned who Chusker was he crushed him with his tail.

Chusker was a member of a species which had blue skin, black eyes and purple blood. When he was killed he had white hair and wore purple clothing. He considered himself important enough that he expected others to have heard of him and was rude to Jabba upon meeting him.

Vu Chusker first appeared in 1995 in Jabba the Hutt: The Dynasty Trap, a comic book written by Jim Woodring and illustrated by Art Wetherell. He was later mentioned in the 64th issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File and received an entry in the 2008 The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
